header.heading: A Night Under the Stars
header.description: Join the Rising Stars at Berkley Church’s historic event venue on November 15, 2019 for the inaugural A Night Under the Stars gala - a sparkly soiree in support of Make-A-Wish® Canada hosted by the Rising Stars Volunteer Committee.

links.title: Buy Tickets
links.description: Join us for an evening of food, live music, dancing and drinks, all while making dreams come true!

links.title: Sponsor the Event
links.description: Have a direct and transformative impact on the lives of children and strategically align your company with one of Canada’s most respected and trusted charitable brands.

links.title: Donate
links.description: Consider a monetary or in-kind donation to impact the lives of local children in the Canada.
